# Principal Component Analysis Applied!

## Citation data

```{r}
library(jsonlite)
citations <- read.csv("../../../usecases_data/explore_paper/j_cunningham_citation.csv")
titles <- read_json("../../../usecases_data/explore_paper/j_cunningham_citation_titles.json")

```

```{r}
dim(citations)
```

```{r}
pr_out <- prcomp(citations)
plot(pr_out$sdev, main="")
png("~/Desktop/loadings.png", 900, 700)
par(mfrow=c(4, 3))
for(i in seq_len(ncol(pr_out$rotation[,1:12]))){
    eigenvec <- pr_out$rotation[, i]
    plot(eigenvec)
    abline(h=0)
}
dev.off()

```
